description: This file sets up a knowledge base using a PDF URL and a MongoDB vector database, then creates an agent to interact with the knowledge base and perform a query.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads PDF content from URLs and stores it in a vector database.

classes.name: MongoDb
classes.description: A class representing a MongoDB vector database connection.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base and handles user queries.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the database.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Prints the agent's response to a query, optionally in markdown format.
